description: ****BARE PROPERTY SALE ******INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY: PROPERTY FOR SALE IN PLAZA DE ESPAÑA, MEJORADA DEL CAMPO, MADRID� This property represents an excellent opportunity for investors, located in the heart of Mejorada del Campo, which guarantees easy access to all services in the area. �This property stands out for its spaciousness, excellent state of conservation and luminosity, making it an attractive option for investors.(I.e. The distribution of the house is organized around a main patio of 20 m2, accessible from the kitchen and living room.It offers 3 double bedrooms, the main one being en-suite and another with a 10 m2 terrace.In addition, it has 2 full bathrooms, one with a shower and the other with a bathtub. In terms of quality, it has built-in and dressed wardrobes in the 3 bedrooms, the windows are double glazed, the flooring is wooden, wooden carpentry and it has heating and hot water using natural gas. Located on the first floor with an elevator, the property offers direct access to a large garage space that includes space for a large car and a motorcycle, along with a spacious storage room, all included in the price. "GET TO KNOW IMPROVED FIELD" With a population of around 25,000 inhabitants, Mejorada del Campo is a town that has experienced a balance between urban growth and the conservation of its traditional character, it is located just 20 km from the center of Madrid.10 minutes from the neighborhoods of Vicálvaro, Rivas and Vallecas, the location offers quick access to large commercial and leisure areas with public transport services such as Metro, Renfe and urban buses that connect with Madrid.In addition, it is strategically located near the R3 highway and the M-50. The bus lines that connect the town with the capital include 280 (Hospital del Henares), 282 (Avda.América), 341 (Conde Casal), 340 (Torrejón de Ardoz), and 285 (Arganda). The area has a wide range of services, such as restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies and schools, providing a complete experience for residents. Mejorada del Campo offers a solid educational offer with 5 public schools, 2 public institutes, several daycare centers and academies that offer extracurricular activities.In addition, it has a health center and emergency services. In terms of sports, the town has numerous facilities for practicing various sports, which adds additional attractiveness to this property. In short, Mejorada del Campo offers a combination of urban amenities, convenient access to essential services and a quieter environment compared to the hustle and bustle of the city.Its history, strategic location and well-established services make this town an attractive option for those seeking a balance between urban life and residential tranquility. ***NOTE**** Meaning of bare property Bare ownership is a legal concept that refers to the right of ownership over an asset but without the right to use or enjoy it.That is, it is defined as the ownership of an asset without possession or the right to enjoy it during a specific period of time. In other words, the person who owns the bare property cannot use or enjoy the asset in question while it is in the hands of the usufructuary.In this situation, for the purposes, it is the person who has the right to use and enjoy it. �Don't miss the opportunity to invest in this unique property with all the amenities it offers. �Contact us for more details and to schedule a visit!

We present this wonderful apartment with three bedrooms and two bathrooms in the quiet Madrid town of Mejorada del Campo. The apartment is located on Calle Santa Rosa, in a residential, quiet area that has all services just a few minutes away. A property with many possibilities that has a wonderful distribution, which makes its 97 square meters a very usable space. The house is located on a third floor, which we will access by stairs with spacious and warm landings. As we enter the house, we are welcomed by the hall-hall that gives access facing the kitchen, on the left is the first bathroom and facing the kitchen is the living room. The kitchen has a very considerable space, both in its length of almost six meters and in its width of five.It is adequately furnished on both walls with countertops and drawers and has practically all the appliances: refrigerator, oven, taps, ceramic hob and extractor hood. The first bathroom is a good size, it has a toilet unit and a shower that enjoys natural light thanks to its windows that overlook the interior patio. The living room is truly wonderful, large, open and clear.It has varnished wooden furniture that gives it a very elegant touch.It also has a closet with mirror doors that multiply the size of the living room in depth. Continuing through the living room we connect with the terrace of the house through fully movable sliding windows. What can we say about the terrace... a wonderful space where you can breathe absolute tranquility.You can watch the arriving and departing planes pass by, contemplating the beautiful views of the town of Mejorada and the fantastic Cathedral of Justo Gallego. Leaving the hall-hall behind, we continue through the main hallway of the house.Which distributes the three rooms that this property has in addition to the second bathroom. To the left of the hallway is the second bathroom.Following on the left is a first bedroom, at the end of the hallway we reach the second bedroom and finally on the right is the main room. The second bathroom is larger than the previous one, it has a beautiful toilet unit decorated in pink as well as a toilet, bidet, and bathtub.Illuminated by natural light it is very spacious and cozy. The first of the bedrooms has a north-west facing space, has a radiator and views of the community's interior patio. The second bedroom is practically identical to the first and with very well preserved finishes. The room - master bedroom is wonderful.Large, illuminated and with inspiring views.It has double windows and a built-in wardrobe with mirror doors. The house is in ideal condition to move into.The floor is stoneware, the installation is Natural Gas and all rooms have radiators. The area is well connected to larger population centers such as Rivas-Vaciamadrid, Arganda del Rey, Alcalá de Henares or Madrid itself. The apartment is owned by the Bank. 100% FINANCING is granted for mortgages.(No extra costs in the application) The buying and selling process is by bidding. The specific data about the published property may be approximate, therefore they are not binding, they are shown for informational purposes. Taxes and expenses NOT INCLUDED: ITP or VAT, Notary, Registry, agency, Appraisal, etc…. Book your appointment to come see it during our extensive hours, including weekends.

Inmobiliaria Corredor del Henares offers you this magnificent villa exclusively. It is a villa in a very central area of Mejorada del Campo. It is very close to the health center, Henares school, shopping area and bus stop. There are 114 m2 of patio that are divided into a rear patio of 64 m2 and a front patio (including terrace) of 50 m2. The 268m2 of the house are distributed over 4 floors: * Basement: Garage, auxiliary room, a large gym room, games room, etc. First floor: Large living-dining room with both very different environments. It has a fireplace with a cassette, a large, equipped and furnished kitchen. In the kitchen, its large window stands out. Complimentary toilet. Finally, from the living room you will have access to the backyard. * Second Floor: Three bedrooms (previously there were four), two full bathrooms (one of them en suite) and terrace in the main room. Boardilla: It has been renovated and is currently used as a room with its own living room. * Regarding the qualities of the home, it has natural gas heating, air conditioning in the living room, master bedroom and attic, double glazed sliding or sliding windows, and a mosquito net. Fireplace in living room, electric garage door, automatic blinds, updated bathrooms and kitchen, possibility of expanding the garage, communal swimming pool. If you are looking for a villa in a magnificent area and of high quality, do not hesitate, CALL US!

Welcome to HISMAD REAL ESTATE MANAGEMENT! We present our villa for sale located in Mejorada del Campo, with an area of 237m2 and a plot of 130m2. In the basement, we find a garage for 3 cars and a bathroom, with the convenience of an automatic entrance door. On the ground floor, the fully furnished kitchen and the separate living room welcome us, as well as a terrace and a large bedroom with a bathroom. On the 1st floor, we find 3 bedrooms, one of them with a bathroom, and another bathroom for the remaining two bedrooms. It also has large built-in wardrobes and another closet in the large hallway. On the 2nd floor, we find a fully finished attic with 4 Velux windows. The plot has a gazebo and a tiled floor, as well as a large storage room. The area is very convenient, since it is close to the shopping center and nearby schools. Don't think twice and come visit it!

WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER ATRAE INMOBILIARIA sells spectacular independent villa in Mejorada del Campo. The property consists of 436 m built according to cadastre on an urban plot of 557 m distributed over three floors, with high quality finishes and great spaciousness. On the main floor we find a stately entrance hall, a large living room with access to a cozy covered porch, a double bedroom, a kitchen with a glazed dining room and a full bathroom. The first floor has three double bedrooms and a bathroom. It also has an impressive master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, separate dressing room and a terrace with beautiful views of the garden. The bedrooms are accessed through a very bright hallway thanks to magnificent high-quality white windows. All rooms have built-in wardrobes, smooth walls, wooden floors and white lacquered doors. The semi-basement floor has a large multipurpose room, a toilet, laundry room and garage with capacity for several cars. The house has several accesses to the garden where we find a wonderful swimming pool and a quiet barbecue area. The location is unbeatable, with all types of services and public transport just a few meters away, enjoying exceptional tranquility.

INMOVELILLA exclusively presents this opportunity, in Mejorada del Campo. It is located on the most central street, the main artery to access any point in the town. The house has a front patio, and access to it where we find a glazed leisure space, and conditioned for both cold and heat, with a double glazed enclosure. We enter the interior of the house through an armored door. Once inside, on the left we have the furnished kitchen. A large glazed hall, and a service toilet. The door to the large living room is L-shaped, and from there we go out to the backyard of the house. Note that the door is double, avoiding cold and heat. On the second floor, we find three bedrooms with lined and dressed built-in wardrobes, and a complete bathroom, where it should be noted that it has a bathtub and a shower tray. In the basement, they currently adapted it as an apartment, so it has a kitchenette and a full bathroom with a shower, bedroom, and dressing room. Originally this floor was intended to be its garage. Mejorada del Campo, is a town very close to the Capital, it is only 20 km away. Public transport has its headquarters on Avda. América, and in Conde de Casal, there are also other bus lines that link this town with those around it, such as Torrejón de Ardoz, and San Fernando de Henares. The cultural offer is very varied, there are all kinds of facilities, where private classes are taught, in Theater, subject reinforcement, English, etc.. . It has all types of sports facilities, offering its inhabitants different sports (heated pool, summer pool, tennis courts, paddle tennis courts, soccer courts, etc... ) It has two institutes, and 5 public schools. Agency fees and taxes not included in the price. If you need financing we have a financial department, which can get 100% financing (always subject to conditions) We are located on Calle Mayor Nº3 in Velilla de San Antonio.

Apartment for sale in Mejorada del Campo, The house has a constructed area of 81 m² distributed in three bedrooms, one of them with a built-in wardrobe, a living-dining room with access to a glazed terrace, a fitted kitchen and a bathroom with a bathtub with a screen. It is located in the heart of Mejorada del Campo, in its surroundings we find the Bichejos Children's School, supermarkets, banks, libraries, pharmacies, post offices, sports centers and several bus stops. It has easy access to M-208. Call us to receive information.

FINCAS QUIÑONES offers this wonderful rustic property in the private area of ​​the Villaflores urbanization. This property consists of approximately 2000 m of plot, all closed with a wall. The farm is a beautiful room very well distributed to enjoy the natural environment that this urbanization offers. At the entrance we find the orchard area and garden to decorate as you wish.Everything is made of printed concrete, very comfortable and easy to care for. The house is a comfortable house with three floors and a large front porch that makes sunsets ideal. On the first floor, we find a large hall that can be used as part of the living room or leave a large open space from which we access the large living room with a fireplace and two windows that overlook the garden, with good orientation. Next we find the very well-kept kitchen with appliances, and a laundry and storage area. We find two very large and comfortable suite-type rooms with large built-in wardrobes, ideal for any type of family. On this floor we find a toilet and another room that can be used as an office or as needed. On the second floor we find two large suite-type rooms with large bathrooms, very bright and with large built-in wardrobes, large windows. On this floor we find a large open-plan living room ideal for celebrations and parties, or to make a gym, with a bar area with a bar, a terrace. In the basement area we find a garage for 6 vehicles, and a storage area, in this area it is also ideal for having parties, you also have a bathroom, the boiler room. The rear part of the property has a swimming pool and jacuzzi, a covered and prepared porch with an outside kitchen.A great area to have parties and enjoy with friends. The house is ideal for a large family, with many rooms, large spaces, very bright since it has all orientations as it is an independent house. The house is built with top quality materials, exposed brick, bars throughout the house, stoneware floors and marble stairs.Wooden doors, on the ground floor it has electric blinds, smooth walls, gray doors on the top floor. A beautiful and very large house for a large family. The farm is on rustic land, it cannot be financed, electricity and water, private security and access control. An undivided portion of the land is sold, the house does not appear in the deeds, the land is sold, ask for better information about the situation of these lands.

WE DO NOT CHARGE THE BUYER AUTHOR HOUSE FOR SALE Do not miss visiting this wonderful single-family home built in the year 2000 with the best exterior and interior qualities. Cadastrally there are 465 m2 built on 3 floors on a plot of almost 800m2. The 3 floors are distributed in: Main Floor: consists of different environments created by integrating the living room, kitchen, cinema area, living area with fireplace, conservatory porch and gazebo. First Floor: 4 bedrooms with shared bathroom and a suite room. Ground floor that has two entrances from the house and from the garden, has an apartment with a fitted kitchen and bathroom. Garage and toilet, cellar and boiler room. Details: Pool, garden with professional maintenance, oil heating, hot and cold air conditioners in all rooms, automatic irrigation, awnings and motorized doors. Visiting is recommended. Do not miss it. POSSIBILITY OF EXCHANGE WITH HOUSING WITHIN THE M30.

description: Inmobiliaria Corredor del Henares offers you an exclusive plot with an independent villa, in Mejorada del Campo. It is a plot of 1300 m2 (approx. ) with a construction of 326 m2 (approx. ) On the plot you will find different environments so that you can enjoy your plot to the fullest. • Pool area that includes SPA, waterfall. If you have ever wanted a relaxation area, here is your chance. • Barbecue area with gazebo. Ideal to spend good times with family and friends. • Garden area. Today, ready to plant whatever you want. In addition, on the plot you will find a storage room with firewood, another room at the back of the house to be used as a warehouse, toilet in the pool area, kennel. The chalet has three floors that are distributed: • Ground floor (128 m2), here you will find a large entrance room with several windows that will always give it a lot of light. It has a fireplace with a cassette player in the sofa area. It has a large kitchen that is fully equipped and furnished and has a large pantry. At the back of the living room through a small hallway, you will have access to the ground floor bathroom and access to the boiler room. • Upper floor (128 m2), has a very spacious master bedroom, its own bathroom with Jacuzzi and dressing room. Two other medium sized bedrooms. The three rooms have air conditioning with heat pump. In the hallway you will have another full bathroom with a shower tray. • Attic (70 m2), which has a single room with access to a large outdoor terrace from where you will have magnificent views of Madrid. Regarding the qualities of the house: • Parquet floor. • Climalit windows. • 42 kW diesel heating with 1,000 l tank. • Hydro chimney with water recirculation pump. • 27,000 l water tank with 5Kw pump connected to a generator, • Two generators of 3 kVA and 40 kVA. • Electrical installation of the pool is individualized and connected to a battery. 3.5 kVA. The Jacuzzi is connected to a generator. • Sixteen 340 volt solar panels and 24 1150 Amp lead acid batteries + 2 Inverters of 5,000 in parallel. All with automatic programming. • Perimeter wall. If you want a quality villa very close to Madrid, don't miss this opportunity and CALL US!

Inmobiliaria Corredor del Henares exclusively offers you this magnificent TOWNHOUSE WITH ELEVATOR within the property. It is a home that could perfectly be used as a senior residence, hotel, or hostel, given its large dimensions. They are 445m2 (approx. ) distributed over 3 floors and a patio of about 110m2. The entire house has double glazed windows and automatic blinds, natural gas heating and hot water (for hot water it also has a 200L thermos), air conditioning with a ducted heat pump, the best quality flooring, smooth paint and a beautiful oak wood staircase. It is distributed as follows: On the ground floor we find: •97m2 living room, very bright with Swedish pine wood windows. •Very spacious kitchen, which is fully furnished and from which we will have access to the patio of the house. •Courtesy toilet. •185m2 garage, which also has a large warehouse, boiler room and laundry and ironing room. •Apartment for service with kitchen, living room, bedroom and bathroom. We will have access to said apartment from the patio of the house and from the garage. On the first floor we find: •A large office •Large, very bright living room with fireplace. •Three large bedrooms, all of them with full bathroom and built-in wardrobes. On the second floor we find: •Kitchen fully equiped. •Large living room. •Three large bedrooms with full bathroom and built-in wardrobes If you want an exclusive villa in Mejorada del Campo with the best qualities and fully equipped, CALL US!

At Novogar Real Estate we offer you this magnificent promotion of 26 homes with 1 and 2 bedrooms under a Cooperative regime, at cost price, where we will find homes on the ground floor, first and second floors, almost all of the homes with terraces and all of them are included in the price of a garage space and a storage room. The promotion has a private interior area, which will be landscaped for community use and with the possibility of creating a swimming pool, games area and community venue for events. Regarding the quality report, we highlight that the homes have underfloor heating/cooling aerothermal and a DHW accumulation tank, which together with ventilation and photovoltaics guarantees having the A classification for energy efficiency. Also optionally, you can design the furniture of your kitchen to your liking and being able to make any modifications to the homes will be considered. The municipality of Mejorada del Campo, with almost 25,000 inhabitants, belongs to the community of Madrid and is just 21 km from the center of Madrid and 10 minutes from the neighborhoods of Vicálvaro, Rivas and Vallecas and their large commercial and leisure areas. , where you will have the public transport services of Metro, Renfe and urban buses to get around Madrid, is located next to the R3 highway very close to the M-50. In addition, the area has all the restaurant services, supermarkets, pharmacies and schools, among others. For any questions or clarifications we can arrange a meeting at our offices, call us without obligation.

description: Spectacular independent villa of 614m2 built on a plot of 1140 meters for sale.Distributed on several loft-type floors with a fireplace, the first module is distributed in a living room, an open kitchen and a bathroom.The black wrought iron staircase gives us access to the upper part where we find the bedroom and bathroom en suite., easily convertible and with the ability to design them on a whim.This entire area plus the other upper module, also with a bedroom, bathroom, living room and open kitchen plus terrace, is surrounded by large tilt-and-turn and sliding windows that are easy to use, with double tempered glass, providing constant natural light throughout the house, also ensuring sound insulation.It also has another diaphanous building currently used as a 450m2 multifunction warehouse with a kitchen area and bathroom, also convertible into more housing and with similar dynamics in terms of windows and natural light, where you can develop all your creativity as needed due to its great surface and excellent height. Along with everything described, we must add two vehicle accesses and three storage rooms.plus another neighboring plot of 555m2 for a total of 1700m2 of ideal plot to continue designing the dream home. Due to the free spaces and the meters with which we have the possibilities that this house offers for recreational areas, guest apartment or others are inexhaustible. The house is practically brand new and newly built, so the plumbing, electricity,.and rest of the elements are new. In the exteriors, the set of lights and spotlights in 24 colors allow us the possibility of creating different environments accompanying the multiple lines of adjustable lights inside. This house is built to be completely autonomous.The generator is charged to supply the 2 houses.with 15 solar panels, inverter and 8 batteries as well as a cistern with a capacity of 20,000 cubic meters of water. Access to the villa by road from Madrid is very simple, taking about 25 minutes to arrive by car.By public transport from Atocha station the arrival time is 18 minutes. In terms of infrastructures, Mejorada del Campo offers us all the comforts and services necessary for any family. Current plans of the house and reform guidelines are provided with a gym, outdoor and indoor swimming pool, solarium, barbecue, bar and games area, children's area, a greater number of rooms, the possibility of a tennis court and a long etcetera. Without a doubt, a unique opportunity to live in a great house at a good price.Unbeatable investment due to the continued growth and demand in the area.We recommend seeing it and verifying in situ the great possibilities it offers. Available to visit at any time.
